name: The Path Of the Shaolin
description:
Game for Oculus Rift made for the Unreal Engine MejaJam.  My game is about completing multiple trials in order to become a shaolin disciple.

Haven't tested it with Steam VR or any other VR heaset.

All assets where sourced from the internet. Outside of the jam period. Huge thanks to Epic Games for all the assets on their marketplace which let me create this game.
